ProjectTitle: Towards a functional cure strategy of HIV infection: Single virus imaging to study the impact of HIV nuclear import and integration on transcription and latency
InitialFeedbackHistory:
01/06/2023
Will you use protocols, readme files and/or metadata generated by your instruments such as OME for microscopy MIxS or MINSEQE for sequencing? For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
You can also consider using a data repository for data preservation and sharing, for example RDR or a disciplinary repository, e.g. EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/), if needed you can keep the files restricted and give access upon request, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
